Game.Name: NBA Playoffs - Bulls vs Blazers (Japan)
Game.plot: The #1 selling Sega basketball game has just been updated for the 1992 season. Now you can play full court, 5-on-5 hoops with the real teams, real players and real signature moves from the 1992 NBA Playoffs. All 16 of the NBA's best teams are here, plus the East and West All-Star squads. Throw down some dunks, bomb from the outside or turn up the 'D'. It's showtime!Cheat: Bulls vs. Blazers in the finalsCXOCGBB4Cheat: Bulls vs. Blazers in the finalsEnter this password to be champions as the bulls. JXWP6BBQCheat: Bulls vs. Blazers in the finalsThe following codes enable you to play as the Miami Heat through the entire playoffs. Vs. Detroit Game 2: 64LBBCB4 Game 3: 64LBBBVS Game 4: 64LBBCV4 Vs. Cleveland Game 5: 64QBBBBR Game 6: 64QBBGBP Game 7: 64QBBDBD Game 8: 64QBBJBJ Vs. Boston Game 9: 64NBBBBL Game 10: 64NBBVBM Game 11: 64NBBLBP Game 12: 64NBB2BN Vs. Utah Game 13: 64SBBBBN Game 14: 64SBDBBS Game 15: 64SBCBBJ Game 16: 64SBFBBC End: 64MBBBBFCheat: Bulls vs. Blazers in the finalsEnter NXWBBBBD as your password.
